statements: SELECT * FROM nft_metadata
SELECT nft_id, token_id, owner_address FROM nft_metadata
SELECT token_uri, owner_address FROM nft_metadata WHERE token_id = '12345'
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT nft_id, token_id, token_uri FROM nft_metadata WHERE owner_address = '0xABCDEF'
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata WHERE owner_address = '0x123abc' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT token_id, token_uri FROM nft_metadata WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT nft_id, owner_address FROM nft_metadata WHERE token_id LIKE '%XYZ%' ORDER BY owner_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY token_id;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_address FROM nft_metadata WHERE token_uri LIKE '%http%' ORDER BY owner_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT token_id, metadata_json FROM metadata_table WHERE owner_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT * FROM transaction_table WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT token_id, transaction_hash FROM transaction_table WHERE transaction_type = 'transfer';
SELECT id, token_id, owner_address FROM metadata_table WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM metadata_table WHERE owner_address = '0x123456789'
SELECT token_id, metadata_json FROM metadata_table WHERE token_id = '101'
SELECT owner_address, COUNT(*) FROM metadata_table GROUP BY owner_address
SELECT token_id, transaction_type, transaction_hash FROM transaction_table WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT m.token_id, t.transaction_type FROM metadata_table m JOIN transaction_table t ON m.token_id = t.token_id
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT token_name, description FROM nft_metadata ORDER BY token_name ASC;
SELECT nft_id, owner_address FROM nft_metadata WHERE nft_id = 100;
SELECT owner_address, total_nfts_owned FROM nft_owners WHERE total_nfts_owned > 5 ORDER BY total_nfts_owned DESC;
SELECT nft_id, amount FROM nft_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT token_name, owner_address FROM nft_metadata WHERE nft_id = 1;
SELECT nft_id, token_name, description FROM nft_metadata WHERE owner_address = '0x1234567890';
SELECT * FROM nft_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT nft_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM nft_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata ORDER BY token_id DESC;
SELECT token_name, token_description FROM nft_metadata WHERE token_id = '12345';
SELECT token_id, owner_address FROM nft_ownership WHERE owner_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT block_hash FROM nft_blockchain WHERE previous_block_hash IS NULL;
SELECT token_id, from_address, to_address FROM nft_transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM nft_metadata;
SELECT token_id, token_name, token_description FROM nft_metadata WHERE token_image_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT token_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM nft_ownership GROUP BY token_id;
SELECT * FROM nft_transactions WHERE from_address='0x123456789';
SELECT token_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM nft_transactions GROUP BY token_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Metadata;
SELECT token_name, token_description FROM NFT_Metadata WHERE blockchain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM NFT_Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM NFT_Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT token_name, owner_name FROM NFT_Metadata INNER JOIN Owners ON NFT_Metadata.blockchain_id = Owners.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Metadata;
SELECT token_id, token_name, token_description FROM NFT_Metadata WHERE token_name='Artwork';
SELECT transaction_id, token_id, transaction_date FROM NFT_Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT blockchain_name, blockchain_network FROM Blockchain_Info WHERE blockchain_name='Ethereum';
SELECT owner_name, owner_wallet_address FROM Owners JOIN NFT_Ownership ON Owners.owner_id = NFT_Ownership.owner_id WHERE token_id='123456' AND ownership_date >= '2022-01-01';
